title: GASLIGHT, GATEKEEP, GIRLBOSS Hub

[[/div]]

[[include :scp-wiki:info:start]]
[[=]]
Co-written by [[*user JakdragonX]], [[*user Ralliston]], and [[*user Trotskyeet]]

[[div style="text-align: center"]]
[[div class="unmargined" style="font-family: 'Cinzel'; font-size: 450%; margin: 2px 0 5px;"]]
Esterberg Weekly
[[/div]]
[[div class="unmargined" style="font-family: 'Pinyon Script'; font-size: 250%; margin: 2px 0 5px;"]]
Your #1. Source of Information
[[/div]]
[[div class="unmargined" style="font-family: serif; font-size: 125%; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid;"]]
[[table style="border: none; width: 100%;"]]
[[row]]
[[cell]]
ESTERBERG, POLAND
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: center;"]]
MONDAY, JANUARY 12TH, 2004
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: right;"]]
10 PLN -- NO REFUNDS
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="unmargined" style="font-family: 'Anton'; font-size: 500%; margin: 2px 0 5px;"]]
BACK IN BLACK
[[/div]]
[[div class="unmargined" style="font-family:serif; font-size:120%;"]]
//By Aine Kayi'leigh//
@@ @@
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="gallery-frame"]]
[[image https://i.postimg.cc/gJV3gxwj/5572aaw.jpg]]
[[/div]]
-----
[[div style="text-align:justify; line-height: 24px"]]
[[div_ style="margin-bottom: 12px;"]]

In an unexpected turn of events, the soul of the long-dead Fae tyrant god, Queen Mab, was stolen last night from the previously thought-to-be-safe SCP Foundation Site-01. All evidence points to a single party being responsible -- Triumviraté, Esterberg's resident monarchist terrorist group, dead-focused on resurrecting their queen.
[[/div]]

[[div_ style="opacity: .75; margin-bottom: 12px;"]]
With an end-of-the-world now once again a real possibility, the aforementioned Jailors immediately launched an official investigation into the group's whereabouts inside the Free Port. Formed from the Directors of their 120th facility, the duo of a fully-awakened reality bender and the least nice person you'll ever meet will definitely give the forest scum quite the hard fight.
[[/div]]

[[div_ style="opacity: .5; margin-bottom: 12px;"]]
Seeking alliances with Marie Surratt, the undead kingpin of the city's underworld, gossip tells of an affiliation between them and the legendary individual known in some places as Nobody, called Hunter in others. It is said that only he could ever manage to rival the Foundation's hatred for the Triumviraté bunch. 
[[/div]]

[[div_ style="opacity: .25; margin-bottom: 30px;"]]
How will this affect Surratt's insanity-driven reign as the supreme leader of Esterberg's criminal world? Where will Nobody's holy hunt against the cult lead? Will the entire group prevail, finally check-mating the never-dead beast Mab is, or will the Starlight triumph once again, finalizing her comeback into reality? It looks like only time will tell...
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="border:solid 1px #999999; padding:5px; margin-bottom: 10px;"]]
[[div style="font-family: serif"]]

[[size 150%]]

[[/div]]

= //{{FINALLY, WE GET SOME GODDAMNED REINFORCEMENTS.}}//

= //Oh, him? He's nobody.//

= //So waste no time, children of crime; for you are almost out of time//

= //And then, all hell went loose.//

= //And yet, you have the delusion to face me. You. Are. Nothing.//

= //For Nobody, the Hunt was everything.//
